website_summaries.verdict: This 8-bottle assortment offers variety and value.
pros: Earns rave reviews for "pure smelling" scents
Oils work well with diffusers and as a base for homemade perfume
cons: Some reports of broken bottles upon arrival, but the manufacturer has since improved packaging

customer_reviews.title: Good quality. I will buy again
customer_reviews.text: Great high quality oils. Great prices. My only gripe is "throwaway" oils such as Eucalyptus are often added to multi packs of essentials, which keeps the cost down. But it is hard to incorporate things like Eucalyptus into anything but a nice bath or foot soak. LOL. This is not to criticize the quality of the oils at all. Very good stuff. And ive recently run out (I make hair and skin products) - so I WILL be buying this kit again. Cheapest way to get some "essential" essentials such as Lavender and Peppermint. Bottles will last you! Ive been into essentials for 10 years. I had not heard of these guys before, but believe me the quality is fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: TheBardd

customer_reviews.title: I dunno if other essential oils I've had in the past were old or poor quality, but these are strong and packaged well
customer_reviews.text: Ok, so I'm really appreciating Art Naturals. I bought the diffuser, now I got my oils. I dunno if other essential oils I've had in the past were old or poor quality, but these are strong and packaged well. It's always a pain when your oils leak. Rosemary and Lavender are my favorites so far. Hope this review is useful because there are a lot of brands available to choose from, happy shopping!
customer_reviews.author: Kecia

customer_reviews.title: comes with an awesome booklet well printed
customer_reviews.text: last review was taken down, lets just say Ive not had any issues from other posts, packaged extremely well, comes with an awesome booklet well printed, scents are as advertised pure, no carrier oils. Bought a second larger pack for the citrus scents.
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: I love them
customer_reviews.text: I love these oils. They work perfect. They do everything listed as stated in the enclosed pamphlet. I've used the tea tees on my sons eczema on his face and it cleared it up in 2 days. I placed the lavender behind his ears and in his wrist and he was sleep within 5-10 minutes. I used others in my diffuser and they smell great as well.
customer_reviews.author: jayeconchan

customer_reviews.title: Faulty pour spouts
customer_reviews.text: ArtNaturals provides excellent essential oils. However, this particular batch pours out so ridiculously fast that I’ve gone through these oils in half the time it usually takes. The batch of AN oils I bought prior to this batch is 10mL, just like this batch, but these bottles do look a little different. They’re a tiny bit smaller and the caps are different. But the label and description are identical. There is nothing in the product information to suggest these are a “fast pour” or anything like that.
customer_reviews.author: Alis G.

customer_reviews.title: I enjoy the peppermint and tea tree the most in my ...
customer_reviews.text: New to all this, I enjoy the peppermint and tea tree the most in my diffuser. The manual that comes with it is awesome. Awesome kit, can't wait to get a bigger one!
customer_reviews.author: Anthony S. Fisher

customer_reviews.title: Lots of lies on the description.
customer_reviews.text: The peppermint bottle spilled, I can smell and see a circle oil stain inside the box. It didn't come with a booklet recipe like it says in the description. It didn't come in a magnet box like in the description, it came in a cardboard box.
customer_reviews.author: cbread

customer_reviews.title: Push & Twist & Twist-Off
customer_reviews.text: ~ Not all caps on bottles were able to be removed. There were 2 types: One had directions on the caps showing to push down and twist. On some of them no matter how hard I tried I couldn't get them open. Others opened fine. The second type was just a twist-off. Some worked, some didn't. ~There were no instructions on how many drops to add to the water. ~ I am returning the 2 sets I bought. ~ Do these companies ever test their product before selling it?
customer_reviews.author: Aspen Snow

customer_reviews.title: Waste
customer_reviews.text: I was very annoyed by this product. So when I received it I could smell the lavender in the box. Some of the fragrances were open and leaked out in the box. There were only two fragrances that were closed but I could only open one. The one that I could open had a weird smell. So...It was a waste of money and time. I do not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Brandi Nichols-Templeton

customer_reviews.title: Order now and enjoy the smells!
customer_reviews.text: Would definitely order again! I bought these with a diffuser as a gift because I had such a great experience with oils myself years ago. Although the package arrived with a small leak, the seller was courteous and great in answering all my questions! I have already ordered more from them! I love that is also came with a book on how to use or mix scents. From what I can tell my friend is going to love this gift!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Expired, improperly stored or just bad quality
customer_reviews.text: I wish I could give this 0 stars. The product was awful. I dont know if it was improperly stored or if the quality is really that bad. The rosemary smelled just like cat piss. At first I thought it was just me but then someone else said the same thing when they walked by my desk and smelt it. The eucalyptus made me nauseous and the lavender was just fowl. I didn't bother opening the other 3 scrnts. I returned it for a refund maybe 10 minutes after opening it.
customer_reviews.author: Elyse Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Smells old
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased other single oil bottles from this company that smelled great but these do NOT. The lavender and eucalyptus are the only 2 I can bare to use and I only use them to help improve the scent of my office. And even those two do not smell nearly as pure and strong as others I have. The other 4 oils in the set smells old and off-putting to the point that I cannot even use them for air freshener purposes. I thought these would be a great choice and a value but I was wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Reviewer 1313

customer_reviews.title: Very GOOD Quality
customer_reviews.text: Bought this before in a larger set. The larger set was sold out this time so I bought this one. The only thing is I wished you had to option of choosing which oils you wanted. As two of the oils, I never use. Apart from that, this is very good. I have bought other brands before and they smell more like candy than real scented oils. I will keep purchasing this brand as long as they maintain the quality of the oils.
customer_reviews.author: Nicka

customer_reviews.title: Not that great
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this with prime & the smells aren’t that great honestly the tea tree and frankincense smell horrible all jokes aside. I’ve been using essential oils from gurunada and betterhomes (Walmart) which smelled 100% better. I kept the rosemary and lavender (doesn’t smell like lavender) I was gonna give away the others but the smell is horrible and the peppermint leaked out the bottle a bit I smelled it before I even opened the box overall I’m not happy
customer_reviews.author: Leeny

customer_reviews.title: Can you even open and you it!
customer_reviews.text: Im very upset with this purchase. I would enjoy them if I was able to open them. I purchased a 6 pck and 3 of them can not be opened. It took me a pair of scissors, a knife, and about 15 minutes breaking the black top off and now I have no way to re-cap it for just one of those that wont open. You can push down and twist all you want they are not going to open. Other oils I have never had this issue with. Would give better rating if the 3 not working would be replace woth ones that do.
customer_reviews.author: Audra

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed & will NOT buy these again! Not because of authenticity or lack of purity, but because some of these bottles are SO difficult to open! How is it possible my kit has 1 bottle (frankincense) that has a simple twist-cap, but all the others are push-and-turn, which are the ones I had issues with? It took several “tries” to open the eucalyptus, and I had to use pliers to get the cap of my peppermint off! My hands and fingers were so sore & raw! I’m not elderly and not diagnosed with arthritis, so these should not be that difficult! From now on I’m buying Walmart brand! Again I’m very disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Anna Scognamiglio

customer_reviews.title: Excellent essential oils and customer service!
customer_reviews.text: My box had two bottles of peppermint oil and was missing the lavender oil, which was the scent I most wanted. The oils seem to be nice, but I'm pretty disappointed. UPDATE: The seller contacted me immediately and offered to send the missing oil, along with another bottle to make up for the problem with the original order. I appreciate the excellent customer service and great product.
customer_reviews.author: OK, Cliff!

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Gift
customer_reviews.text: Perfect gift to go with an aromatherapy unit. These are the top oils so the person new to aromatherapy can have a nice sampling and decide which is their favorites. Everyone wants a clean-fresh smelling home. The gift of a unit and these oils is a great wedding or house warming gift. Even if they already have one, it is not like a blender...you can never have too many.
customer_reviews.author: Sally Mallard

customer_reviews.title: Great for dryer balls!
customer_reviews.text: Some of the scents just didn't do it for me - but aside from that - these are PERFECT! I use them to put some scented drops on our wool dryer balls to help infuse our clothes with good smells while being dryed and these are perfect! They just sit right on top of the dryer in their box they came in for easy accessibility! Will definitely buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly A. Gegg

customer_reviews.title: Useful 6 Essential Oils
customer_reviews.text: I have used essential oils previously... but was completely out of the ones we have found most useful... namely peppermint, tea tree, lavender, and eucalyptus. I also had heard that Frankincense was a useful antibacterial essential oil. So it was great to find this 6-pack, which had all 5 that I really wanted, of 100% pure essential oils. Delivery was prompt, and when I had a question about the oils, the seller was very responsive. I have already started to use them, and am happy with the purchase. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Tittle

customer_reviews.title: I like them they have a good strong scent
customer_reviews.text: You can use essential oils for just about everything except for cooking of course. At least I wouldn't think you would want to cook with some of these I the scent's you can try I guess? The little art naturals thing is a book (the thing at the front of all the essential oils) not that you can't get it online but it actually has a lot of neat things in it that you can do with essential oils so I like it pretty good I might buy this again if I run out.
customer_reviews.author: kevin clyde

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality Oils at an Affordable Price
customer_reviews.text: The presentation was good. Came in a box that would have been easy to wrap as a gift, which is why I bought it. The oils smell really good, not overly sweet which can be in indicator of fillers being used. The price was affordable. I did have a little hiccup in delivery. One of the bottles was not sealed properly and the contents spilled out during delivery. The frankincense bottle was empty when I received the box. Amazon customer service came through with a partial credit which allowed me to purchase an individual bottle to complete the set.
customer_reviews.author: laura cody

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I've had these for a few years bc I bought them when I was pregnant. My son is 2 now and I'm just really getting into using them for myself and my family. With this COVID-19 outbreak, we are doing more to try to prevent it from hitting our household, so these oils in a facial steamer we use daily. Not sure if its helping,but it's worth a try. Plus, I know it helps with allergies bc I've had less issues with that.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly B

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I’ve ordered from Art naturals before and have been satisfied but am disappointed by this last order. My product smelled wonderful as expected BUT! come to find my Euclyptus had completely leaked and the whole bottle was empty and while the product states leakproof, this clearly wasn’t the case. Not to mention not all products are the same. In the picture you can see that one bottle isn’t like the other. The Rosemary bottle pictured isn’t the same as all the others and it too, isn’t full, nor was my lavender or tea tree.
customer_reviews.author: Twinkle Munar

customer_reviews.title: Good Price
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the 6 pack to start, I could only open 5 of the oils. I use a good quality 400 ml oil diffuser, instructions say to use 2-3 drops per 100 ml. I have to use more like 10. The 5 of 6 oils that I've used do smell nice and for the price I can't complain about having to use more than 2-3 drops. I would say that the packaging is mediocre at best, I probably will try another brand after this.
customer_reviews.author: Dulce

customer_reviews.title: Bottles won't open
customer_reviews.text: The lids on these bottles are different than the previous oils (same brand) I have bought. The lids look bigger and won't catch the seal to open. The lid just spins around or won't move. We will have to break the lids if we want to use oils. Won't buy from this seller again. This should have been caught before packing and sending. Waste if money.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Raymond

customer_reviews.title: Peppermint smells amazing
customer_reviews.text: Great oils! I’m pretty picky about my scents and I love these. I am usually not a fan of peppermint but omg this brands peppermint smells AMAZING. It’s a clean and fresh scent. The Lavender is pretty good too. Comes with a little booklet on the benefits of each essential oil as well. Great gift for someone or yourself.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Damaged Product
customer_reviews.text: Received my package today and could smell hints of peppermint, however, I did not think anything of it. Once I opened the package, the smell of peppermint became very strong. I could see that the oil was on the inside of the box. Once I picked up the peppermint, I could tell the lid was not on tightly and there was less than a 1/2 of the bottle left.
customer_reviews.author: Quinn

customer_reviews.title: Defective Product
customer_reviews.text: The packaging looks great but myself and 4 other people could not get the top off the jars to use the oils. There is definitely something wrong with the way they sealed these jars. I had to return them even for that price, we could not get one jar open.
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: The Best Aromatherapy Essential Oil !
customer_reviews.text: For a long time, I wanted to try essential oils at my house. I wanted to see the feeling it will give to me and which oil i will prefer the most. Therefore, and after reading good reviews for these oils on healthyourself.life, I ordered this Sampler set. The set came in a nice little box, and I could immediately smell them as soon as I opened the box. Thesesmell fantastic and are lasting a long time. Also, their price was unbeatable. They are very strong, but not overly so. I use them a lot in oil diffusers and in homemade hand lotions. When the diffuser is working, I can really feel more relax and calm.
customer_reviews.author: adi ben ishay

customer_reviews.title: Packaging had a leak but I still highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: I got this today. I took off 1 Star because like other reviewers, there was a small leak in the Frankincense bottle, which after opening the package the smell filled my living room. The cap was partially open and definitely lose so I closed it right away to avoid any more accident. You do have to put some effort to opening the bottles but other than the unfortunate leakage, it smells wonderful in my humidifier. I also put drops of lavender in my wool dryer balls and it smells amazing. Despite the little accident of packaging, I definitely recommend this product. Great deal for your money too!
customer_reviews.author: Rae N

customer_reviews.title: Product is Great but Opening Some of the Bottles is a Real Chore
customer_reviews.text: The product is great. The 4 star instead of 5 star is for the bottle tops. Trying to get one of the bottoms opened resulted in me wasting half of the tea tree oil upon opening. With one of the other bottles, I had to use a wrench to open it. I think this company needs to redesign their tops.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonInCA

customer_reviews.title: Lovely Gift
customer_reviews.text: I received those product as a gift once and falling in love with them, variable fragrances , delicate , exquisite aroma inside your home which isn't bother you and give you peace and calm , then I decided to brought more and never regret to do it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Smells so good!
customer_reviews.text: Love these oils. Smell great, long last scent. Only issue I had was the one bottle (peppermint if you care) the lid would not come off when trying to unscrew it (I think it was glued weirdly or something). I ended up needed to destroy the black cap entirely and the white inner one some in order to get it off. The white inner lid does seal my oil however so it doesn't leak, so no real issue long term. Just a bit frustrating. Overall an awesome product and well priced.
customer_reviews.author: Sam Beach

customer_reviews.title: Everyone at work wants one of these kits.
customer_reviews.text: They are overall nice, but I don't know how to mix the right scents. So far, the best mixes I've tried are lavender, frankincense and rosemary in equal amounts, and lavender with eucalyptus. When I mix those, everyone wants to seat at my office to enjoy and relax. Also, frankincense with tea tree and eucalyptus smells like a nice hotel room.
customer_reviews.author: Yanilka

customer_reviews.title: Poor bottle packaging
customer_reviews.text: Apparently i missed the return window. It’s almost impossible to open the bottles. I hurt my hand opening them and two of them are just impossible to open so i cannot use them!
customer_reviews.author: XCHARLI

customer_reviews.title: New caps suck
customer_reviews.text: I can’t even get the bottles open. I’ve bought these before and I was super excited about the leak proof but it’s kinda ridiculous three grown men can’t get the cap off. 2 out of 6.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for diffuser!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product and the variety in this package offered a great mixture! The lavender is my favorite! If you’re searching for diffuser oils like I was, these work perfectly so look no further. I had a hiccup with one of my oils and the seller offered exceptional customer services and smoothed it out quickly. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Shelbi

customer_reviews.title: Essential to Daily Postive Living
customer_reviews.text: Giving five stars because 5/6 of the scents are amazing. Couldn’t get the cap off of one of the scents though and tried everything. But still wasn’t deterred from giving 5 stars. Great scents and very relaxing. Will instantly change your mood.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Very fresh and Strong
customer_reviews.text: Very impressed with these oils they are very strong and potent. Soon as I open the Amazon packaging the smell of the oils burst out and I thought that my oils had wasted. But they wasnt they was just so strong and fresh. I hate wasting money and this is one product I can say I'm glad I bought and I'm going to order more. Very nicely packed too
customer_reviews.author: Jay Why

customer_reviews.title: Natural oils for my new diffuser
customer_reviews.text: These are superior to any I have had in the past. I received them as stated I would . I did not need to contact the seller , as I am very satisfied with working with them. When I run out, I will reorder with them
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Weak scents
customer_reviews.text: The dispensing is not really the best. It’s difficult to get drops to come out like most of the essential oils dispensers do. It kind of pours out which will make it get used up faster. Also, the scents are not that pungent.
customer_reviews.author: Monica Berry

customer_reviews.title: great!
customer_reviews.text: love! Love the box it comes in. Didnt think these would last too long but ive had them for about a year and just now used up ONE whole bottle. Still have plenty of all the others. So they’ve lasted a long time! Great smell
customer_reviews.author: Alex Woods

customer_reviews.title: Nice strong scent goes long way
customer_reviews.text: Shipped nicely wrapped. It was hard to unscrew but I figured it out. Nice leakproof lids and worked perfectly for my bodycare products. Scent is nice and strong so bottles will go a long way.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: All natural essential oils
customer_reviews.text: So far I don't like them. I needed two scents so I got the kit. First of all it took me five minutes to open the first bottle. I'm double jointed and still couldn't do it. But luckily it was a seal and once broke, it opens better. But the scents are no fun. They smell ok. I have it on now, and I can't smell anything and I put a bunch in there. I wish I got the ones I needed and something flowery or tropical maybe. I won't buy them again. Not these scents anyway
customer_reviews.author: get a new saverðŸ˜¤ðŸ˜ ðŸ˜¬ðŸ˜¡

customer_reviews.title: Defective cap, very weak scent
customer_reviews.text: had to return because bottle cap cannot be opened. you can twist it all day long, ply it, do whatever, it's just defective and won't open. only 1/6 bottles come in openable cap and the smell isn't very long lasting. you can barely smell anything at all when put into a diffuser even at large amount.
customer_reviews.author: Deric

customer_reviews.title: I love this brand
customer_reviews.text: Too me this is worth purchasing. I cannot afford Doterra or Plant Therapy so this is the next best thing. You do not need to use alot of the oils either. I recently purchased the 16 count and some of the 4oz bottles (Tea Tree, Lavender, & Eucalyptus). I will be purchasing this again and will try the blended sents
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They smell great!
customer_reviews.text: OK, I call them hocum and poke fun at my wife for using them daily, but honestly, if nothing else they smell great used in the diffuser.
customer_reviews.author: BLan65

customer_reviews.title: Not as they were
customer_reviews.text: Second time we bought these. Huge difference now, they are mostly water. Very disappointing
customer_reviews.author: dduryea

customer_reviews.title: Good price
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my diffuser. I don’t use these internally or topically so I can’t judge about that. But they are great in my diffuser or mixed with water and sprayed on upholstery.
customer_reviews.author: Taryn H.

customer_reviews.title: Possibly used product; leaking package
customer_reviews.text: The packaging looked nice but I could smell the oil before opening it. Once opened, I saw that the rosemary and tea tree had both been leaking. The rosemary seal was already broken and the tea tree oil has an entirely different cap on the bottle than the rest. I am really disappointed in my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Adrienne F

customer_reviews.title: Bottles are EXTREMELY hard to open
customer_reviews.text: I would love to give a review on how these smell, but I have had them for three days now and have only been able to open one bottle (Lavender) which does smell pretty good. Also, when the package arrived, I could smell the essential oils before I even opened the package they were delivered in. I was worried one of the bottles had been broken or was already open, that's how strongly it smelled. I'm sure the delivery driver was happy to have it out of his van. I'll update my review again if I am ever able to get one of these bottles open...
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Disgusting
customer_reviews.text: Every single scent in this product smells awful. Just when you think the peppermint scent is a safe bet, nope... just as disgusting. These scents literally make me sick to my stomach. Save your money, these are very unpleasant. Also, the eucalyptus oil came in a different lid and didn't come with a stopper so the oil could come out in drops. I feel very ripped off.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: THE BEST OILS I HAVE FIND and USE
customer_reviews.text: Love the price, but LOVE the scent more. Next time I will be ordering more. They have my vote for the BEST Art Naturals Aromatherapy Essential Oils 100% Pure of The Highest Quality. I AGREE............
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: could not get the lids off
customer_reviews.text: a waste of my money as the bottle are not able to be opened. three of us tried to open them, no luck, I even tried to cut the little white ring off and ended up stabbing my self on the palm of my hand. so they just sit there.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra metteer

customer_reviews.title: Used in my diffuser
customer_reviews.text: These oils are as described. I have never purchased any before, so I don't know how they compare to others. I have noticed that I have to use more than my diffuser states in order to smell the oils. The diffuser say 3 drops per 100ml distilled water. I have to use 4-5 drops. Could be me. Not everyone's sense of smell is the same. I may try another brand next time, just to see. Pleased overall.
customer_reviews.author: LAE

customer_reviews.title: Best Combo Box ever!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing to find these 6 scents in one place! All of my favorites and I didn’t have to create a custom box. Also a great way of testing out some new oils if you aren’t committed to a scent.
customer_reviews.author: K. Dugan

customer_reviews.title: The Packet of Possibilities!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! I have truly been missing out until now. What can't essential oils do. Nothing that's what... aromatherapy, mixed with carrier oils. body massage .....oh yeah insect repellent. I mean woah!! I am a believer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bottle difficult to open
customer_reviews.text: Smells amazing Once I got the lavender open; however I struggled for an hour to open the bottle. How do you get this thing open without knives, shears and stress?
customer_reviews.author: Book&ShoeLover

customer_reviews.title: Best affordable oil brand available
customer_reviews.text: Great price for quality oils! I’ve been using essential oils for years, mostly the more expensive brands. This is the only affordable brand that actually works for pain, calming, diffusing, etc. that I have found.
customer_reviews.author: Greatlakesgirl

customer_reviews.title: One bottle stripped out
customer_reviews.text: I really like these oils BUT the peppermint will not open, its stripped out, I cannot use the peppermint
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Love them! Large, Well Wrapped, & Smell Great
customer_reviews.text: Love them! The oils came very well wrapped, are larger than expected, and smell great. I can’t wait to use them in my air diffuser, baths, and with massage oil. I love combining the oils to make natural sanitizers/fresheners for my home. Very relaxing.
customer_reviews.author: Tammi

customer_reviews.title: bottle leaked
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased these in the past and never had an issue. Two of the bottles in the kit were open and one leaked out a good amount.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: High quality product
customer_reviews.text: My daughter used these oils to make bath bombs. They are very concentrated so a little goes a long way. Even after months of no use them are still in great shape and strong smell
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Not a good batch
customer_reviews.text: Packaging wasn’t good couple oils where leaking and half empty. Not sure why the scent seemed off may of been old or diluted.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Hubbard

customer_reviews.title: Nice set
customer_reviews.text: This is a great essential oil set. It has all your oil necessities that you use in daily use. The eucalyptus, rosemary, peppermint and tea tree are very strong. I love those. I dont know if my nose is off but the frankencinse and lavender smell the same. I just cant get a good frankencinse from anywhere. But othet than that, this set is awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Online Shopping Guru

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t smell good
customer_reviews.text: They smell cheap and I wasn’t impressed at all. Some of the oils don’t even smell like what they are supposed to
customer_reviews.author: Dommy bruceter

customer_reviews.title: Only 1 out of 6 actually opens
customer_reviews.text: Everything about this product is great. The minute I opened the package I could already smell it. The packaging was nice and from what I could tell it smelled great. You’re probably wondering why I’m giving it 2 stars. Out of the 6 oils, I was only able to open 1 which was rosemary. I don’t know if it has to do with packaging but no matter how hard I try to open the other 5 I can’t. It’s a shame how I can’t test out the other 5 scents since the caps are broken.
customer_reviews.author: Angeline Saget

customer_reviews.title: Great oils!
customer_reviews.text: Oils are really good quality! I use them in my diffuser, on my skin when it's been diluted, and on fabrics like my bed/clothes and they always smell wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Good price bad product
customer_reviews.text: Not worth the reasonable price. Oils are ok but the bottles are impossible to open. There are 3 I literally can not use because of the crappy child lock cap, and the ones I did open the plastic inside came out as well so the oil just pours out. Not worth it
customer_reviews.author: Brian Kostiuk

customer_reviews.title: A perfect starter kit for essential oils!
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite brand of essential oils that I have tried thus far! These scents are amazing and I love how there is a little booklet included, explaining what each of the oils helps with. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: There was not one drop of lavendar in the bottle...it had all run out.  The top was not on right.
customer_reviews.text: It took some time to get here and when it did there was not even a drop of lavender in the bottle. Not Happy.
customer_reviews.author: Janice McPhail

customer_reviews.title: Not sure.
customer_reviews.text: The scents are not very strong. Doesn't last long. Would have been better if the scents lingered... The peppermint, does tingle on your skin tho.
customer_reviews.author: R.C

customer_reviews.title: SO STRONG
customer_reviews.text: Wow. This stuff. Smells. So strong. And not the good kind. Overwhelmed. Through the box. I am not into it. Look nice. Too strong.
customer_reviews.author: Blair Lahola

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: They smell great. They all work (which has been an issue with some other oils I've purchased in the past).
customer_reviews.author: Y. Cantrell

customer_reviews.title: Great assortment! Diffusing in my office.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these to diffuse in my office. They are fantastic. I've enjoyed trying out each of the different fragrances. My favorites so far are peppermint and lavender. They are pretty potent so I expect they will last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: M. Brinson

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this. I am allergic to orange, this was the ONLY pack that cane with out the orange ! They’re great I love lavender
customer_reviews.author: Mattison Sims

customer_reviews.title: Hard to open
customer_reviews.text: When I got these i was really excited because you could smell the scents through the box. Packing was nice and simple until you got to the part where you had to open the bottle, it was a struggle because you had to push the cap down to open very hard and i had to use scissors to break the seal inside. Despite that struggle, the oils smell great inside of my diffuser and are really strong so you only need just a few drops.
customer_reviews.author: Destiny Spencer

customer_reviews.title: I Love Them
customer_reviews.text: They smell so good! I put these in my diffuser all the time. There has been a lot of smoke in the air where I live, the peppermint oil helps relieve the headache and congestion the air has given me. The bottles are bigger than I expected, and they come with a built in dropper so you don't need any additional tools. 10/10 Would recommend :)
customer_reviews.author: Julia Gates

customer_reviews.title: Smell amazing and they do their job!!
customer_reviews.text: The oils smell amazing and they do what they’re supposed to do. Their customer service is awesome they are very curteous and helpful. Will continue to buy.
customer_reviews.author: valdeza

customer_reviews.title: Bad small, great presentation. Wouldn’t recommend
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t listen to the reviews that said they smell gross. Well...they do!! The lavender is a**, eucalyptus is okay a**, and the peppermint is the only one that doesn’t smell like COMPLETE A** !!! Excuse my language but I wanted to make sure no one made my mistake of thinking the reviews were just being harsh. they were not, this stuff stinks :(
customer_reviews.author: Jaqueline Paz

customer_reviews.title: Defective seals - can't even open the bottles
customer_reviews.text: Unable to open 5 out of the 6 bottles due to defective seals. I read other reviews before I bought this where there were similar problems but I did not heed the warnings... This seems to be a recurring problem so buy only if you think luck will be on your side.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Good deal
customer_reviews.text: These are very good and the smell is strong. This is my first time with oils and the price for these was just right for a first timer I feel like. You don't need to add a lot just a couple drops is all it took for me..
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and good price
customer_reviews.text: Recently bought this oils and I'm sure I'm going to repeat, They work perfect with diffusers and I use the tea tree one for my beard, its the best oil for hair care.
customer_reviews.author: The Wolves

customer_reviews.title: Misleading advertisement
customer_reviews.text: Just received these and they do smell wonderful. I’m sure the quality of the oils are fine but unless I’ve missed something, the advertisement is misleading. My set came with frankincense rather than orange (which was in the description) and no magnetic box just cardboard. And one bottle had leaked a bit. I’m sure I’ll be happy with the oils but the advertisement needs some updating and correcting.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Trout

customer_reviews.title: Far too difficult to open
customer_reviews.text: Smell great but don’t give these to anybody that isn’t the hulk. I have very large and strong hands but I needed a screwdriver to crack the seal on most of these. Shouldn’t be so ungodly hard to open. Odd that the negative reviews either state that they spilled all over or can’t be opened. Give us some middle ground.
customer_reviews.author: Phil

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Got these to go with an oil diffuser for my mom for Mother’s Day. She loves the scents and said it was the perfect variety to get her started. Great gift.
customer_reviews.author: Thee Jessica Bee

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I love ArtNaturals and love supporting them! I purchased these as a gift and they were well received!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I’m so glad I found this brand
customer_reviews.text: Finally! Quality essential oils that really work and are affordable. I’m so glad I found this brand. The peppermint oil made my 24 hour old cluster headache go away and relaxed my muscles. What a Godsend! I HIGHLY recommend this company and their products. I also bought the oil diffuser and am in love with it!! 💕💕👍🏻👍🏻 ⭐️ ⭐️ ⭐️ ⭐️ ⭐️
customer_reviews.author: Tara

customer_reviews.title: Caps won’t come off!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these to have a new set since my old bottles of oils where almost gone. Everything came fine in the package until i tried to take the lid off the peppermint bottle. It’s so stuck. It won’t come off no matter how hard I try. Disappointed because peppermint was of the oils I was completely out of. They smell fine.. but not being able to use it because of the cap, sucks.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Perfect product, perfect shipping!
customer_reviews.text: Have bought ArtNatural oils several times now and very satisfied with the quality of all, peppermint and rosemary are my favs.
customer_reviews.author: Tony Bado

customer_reviews.title: I want answers
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this oil set and when I receive it the rosemary oil spilled out and I smelled it before I even opened the box.. why is it that all the other oils was full and good and the rosemary oil wasn’t. Why nobody checked it is all the oils was okay and locked tight
customer_reviews.author: Toni Benjamin

customer_reviews.title: Nice products but the Tea Tree oil is not my favorite
customer_reviews.text: The packaged came as described and scents really smells good especially the Eucalyptus, Lavender and Peppermint. It helps me have a good sleep and made the whole house smells good. But I was just kind of disappointed with the Tea Tree oil scent, its not really my favorite but it comes along with this set of package. Maybe my next purchase will be by Bottle, but above it all I'm really satisfied with my order.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Mercedes

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: Was a gift for someone but they love this selection! Diffused well!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great smelling oils
customer_reviews.text: Frankincense leaked all out except maybe 1 ml. Other bottles were fine. I'll write the company to see about a replacement. I really love these oils.
customer_reviews.author: Judy Ann Peacock

customer_reviews.title: Bad packaging
customer_reviews.text: These oils are great, but the packaging is terrible. The top broke and I had to cut it open, which left me without a lid.
customer_reviews.author: K. Poe

customer_reviews.title: Great Selection of Oils
customer_reviews.text: This kit offers a great selection of essential oils. While there are still many more essential oils available this kit offers the most popular oils and offers tips and tricks on how to get the most out of your oils.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: What a buy!  Thanks for the incredible oils.
customer_reviews.text: Incredible price for these 10 ml bottles. The incredible sensual experience of just opening the box made me very happy. Can't wait to mix some sprays and make some oils from Pinterest.
customer_reviews.author: STARCAN

customer_reviews.title: Need easier tops to open
customer_reviews.text: Ughhh, I cannot open half of these bottles. I can only open 3. I'm not sure what I did, but I was simply turning the top like I did the other ones and it's not opening. Not sure what to do. The tea tree is the only one with a different top and that 1 is 100% easy to open.
customer_reviews.author: Donnette E.

customer_reviews.title: Some caps do not unscrew
customer_reviews.text: I was unable to open 2 of the 6 oils, the cap would not unscrew despite myself and several others at my therapy office trying for 2 days straight. Absolutely not worth the money, I am extremely disappointed and dissatisfied
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: ArtNaturals Aromatherapy Top-6 Essential Oil Set - (6 x 10ml Bottles) - 100% Pure of the Highest Therapeutic Grade Quality - Premium Gift Set – Lavender, Peppermint, Tea Tree, Eucalyptus
feature_bullets: AROMA AS THERAPY: At ArtNaturals, we believe that aroma is the best therapy. And it smells way better, and costs way less than other forms of therapy. Our luxuriously scented, pure essential oils can help you slay your day and sleep tight all night.

MAKE SCENTS OF YOUR SPACE: When used with ArtNaturals aroma diffusers, our essential oils can transform your Om Sweet Home into a relaxing sanctuary of scented bliss. Breathe in tranquility, breathe out stress. No yoga pass required.

GET CREATIVE: We’d love to inspire you with our DIY essential oil recipes for beauty, health, and home. Or you can create your own vibe by designing your own signature scents. Mixing artnaturals essential oils together is so easy, you’ll be a scent ninja in no time.

SCIENCE STUFF: ArtNaturals essential oils are 100% pure, unadulterated, therapeutic grade, and GC/MS tested. Analysis reports are available on our website if you’re into that kind of thing. But you can just let your nose be the judge.

PURITY PLEASE: When it comes to essential oils, purity is everything you want and nothing you don’t. That’s why artnaturals essential oils are always pure, vegan, and cruelty-free. So you can smell good while feeling good. We take our purity promise to you seriously, but please have fun with our products.

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
